00088 BOOLEAN SetCurrentPopUpBox( UINT32 uiId )
00089 {
00090       // given id of the box, find it in the list and set to current
00091 
00092       //make sure the box id is valid
00093       if( uiId == (UINT32) -1 )
00094       {
00095             //ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Error: Trying to set Current Popup Box using -1 as an ID" );
00096             return( FALSE );
00097       }
00098 
00099       // see if box inited
00100       if( gpPopUpBoxList[ uiId ] != NULL )
00101       { 
00102             gPopUpTextBox = gpPopUpBoxList[ uiId ];
00103             return( TRUE );
00104       }
00105       return ( FALSE );
00106 }

00108 BOOLEAN OverrideMercPopupBox( MercPopUpBox *pMercBox )
00109 {
00110 
00111       // store old box and set current this passed one
00112       gOldPopUpTextBox = gPopUpTextBox;
00113 
00114       gPopUpTextBox = pMercBox;
00115 
00116       return( TRUE );
00117 }
00118 
00119 BOOLEAN ResetOverrideMercPopupBox( )
00120 {
00121       gPopUpTextBox = gOldPopUpTextBox;
00122 
00123       return( TRUE );
00124 }

00127 BOOLEAN InitMercPopupBox( )
00128 {
00129       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00130   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00131 
00132       // init the pop up box list
00133       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_NUMBER_OF_POPUP_BOXES; iCounter++ )
00134       {
00135             // set ptr to null
00136             gpPopUpBoxList[ iCounter ] = NULL;
00137       }
00138 
00139       // LOAD STOP ICON...
00140       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00141       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\msgboxicons.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00142       if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiBoxIcons ) )
00143             AssertMsg(0, "Missing INTERFACE\\msgboxicons.sti" );
00144 
00145       // LOAD SKULL ICON...
00146       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00147       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\msgboxiconskull.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00148       if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiSkullIcons ) )
00149             AssertMsg(0, "Missing INTERFACE\\msgboxiconskull.sti" );
00150 
00151 
00152       return( TRUE );
00153 }

00155 
00156 BOOLEAN ShutDownPopUpBoxes( )
00157 {
00158 
00159       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00160       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_NUMBER_OF_POPUP_BOXES ; iCounter++ )
00161       {
00162             // now attempt to remove this box
00163             RemoveMercPopupBoxFromIndex( iCounter );
00164       }
00165 
00166       return( TRUE );
00167 }

00173 // Tactical Popup
00174 BOOLEAN LoadTextMercPopupImages( UINT8 ubBackgroundIndex, UINT8 ubBorderIndex)
00175 {
00176       VSURFACE_DESC           vs_desc;
00177       VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00178 
00179   // this function will load the graphics associated with the background and border index values
00180       
00181       // the background
00182   vs_desc.fCreateFlags = VSURFACE_CREATE_FROMFILE | VSURFACE_SYSTEM_MEM_USAGE;
00183       strcpy(vs_desc.ImageFile,  zMercBackgroundPopupFilenames [ ubBackgroundIndex ]);
00184       CHECKF(AddVideoSurface(&vs_desc, &gPopUpTextBox->uiMercTextPopUpBackground));
00185  
00186   // border
00187   VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00188       FilenameForBPP( zMercBorderPopupFilenames[ ubBorderIndex ], VObjectDesc.ImageFile );
00189       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &gPopUpTextBox->uiMercTextPopUpBorder ) );
00190 
00191       gPopUpTextBox->fMercTextPopupInitialized = TRUE;
00192 
00193       // so far so good, return successful
00194       gPopUpTextBox->ubBackgroundIndex = ubBackgroundIndex;
00195       gPopUpTextBox->ubBorderIndex              = ubBorderIndex;
00196 
00197       return( TRUE );
00198 }
00199 
00200 void RemoveTextMercPopupImages( )
00201 {
00202       //this procedure will remove the background and border video surface/object from the indecies
00203       if( gPopUpTextBox )
00204       {
00205             if( gPopUpTextBox->fMercTextPopupInitialized )
00206             {
00207                   // the background
00208                   DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex( gPopUpTextBox->uiMercTextPopUpBackground );
00209   
00210                   // the border
00211                   DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( gPopUpTextBox->uiMercTextPopUpBorder );
00212 
00213                   gPopUpTextBox->fMercTextPopupInitialized = FALSE;
00214             }
00215       }
00216 
00217       // done
00218       return;
00219 }

00221 BOOLEAN RenderMercPopUpBoxFromIndex( INT32 iBoxId, INT16 sDestX, INT16 sDestY, UINT32 uiBuffer )
00222 {
00223 
00224       // set the current box
00225       if( SetCurrentPopUpBox( iBoxId ) == FALSE )
00226       {
00227             return ( FALSE );
00228       }
00229 
00230       // now attempt to render the box
00231       return( RenderMercPopupBox( sDestX,  sDestY,  uiBuffer ) );
00232 }

00234 BOOLEAN RenderMercPopupBox(INT16 sDestX, INT16 sDestY, UINT32 uiBuffer )

00255       else

00276       // return success or failure
00277   return fReturnValue;

00281 
00282 INT32 AddPopUpBoxToList( MercPopUpBox *pPopUpTextBox )
00283 {
00284       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00285 
00286       // make sure is a valid box
00287       if( pPopUpTextBox == NULL )
00288       {
00289             return ( -1 );
00290       }
00291 
00292       // attempt to add box to list
00293       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_NUMBER_OF_POPUP_BOXES; iCounter++ )
00294       {
00295             if( gpPopUpBoxList[ iCounter ] == NULL )
00296             {
00297                   // found a spot, inset
00298                   gpPopUpBoxList[ iCounter ] = pPopUpTextBox;
00299                   
00300                   // set as current
00301                   SetCurrentPopUpBox( iCounter );
00302 
00303                   // return index value
00304                   return( iCounter );
00305             }
00306       }
00307 
00308       // return failure
00309       return( -1 );
00310 }
00311 
00312 // get box with this id
00313 MercPopUpBox * GetPopUpBoxIndex( INT32 iId )
00314 {
00315       return( gpPopUpBoxList[ iId ] );
00316 }

00318 INT32 PrepareMercPopupBox(  INT32 iBoxId, UINT8 ubBackgroundIndex, UINT8 ubBorderIndex, STR16 pString, 
00319                                           UINT16 usWidth, UINT16 usMarginX, UINT16 usMarginTopY, UINT16 usMarginBottomY, 
00320                                           UINT16 *pActualWidth, UINT16 *pActualHeight)
00321 {
00322       UINT16 usNumberVerticalPixels, usNumberOfLines;
00323       UINT16 usTextWidth, usHeight;
00324       UINT16 i;
00325   HVOBJECT  hImageHandle;
00326       UINT16 usPosY, usPosX;
00327       VSURFACE_DESC           vs_desc;
00328       UINT16 usStringPixLength;
00329       SGPRect DestRect;
00330   HVSURFACE hSrcVSurface;
00331   UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
00332       UINT32 uiSrcPitchBYTES;
00333   UINT16  *pDestBuf;
00334       UINT8  *pSrcBuf;
00335       UINT8       ubFontColor, ubFontShadowColor;
00336       UINT16      usColorVal;
00337       UINT16      usLoopEnd;
00338       INT16       sDispTextXPos;
00339       MercPopUpBox *pPopUpTextBox = NULL;
00340 
00341       if( usWidth >= SCREEN_WIDTH )
00342             return( -1 );
00343 
00344       if( usWidth <= MERC_TEXT_MIN_WIDTH )
00345             usWidth = MERC_TEXT_MIN_WIDTH;
00346 
00347       // check id value, if -1, box has not been inited yet
00348       if( iBoxId == -1 )
00349       {
00350             // no box yet
00351             
00352             // create box
00353             pPopUpTextBox = (MercPopUpBox *) MemAlloc( sizeof( MercPopUpBox ) );
00354 
00355             // copy over ptr
00356             gPopUpTextBox = pPopUpTextBox;
00357 
00358                   // Load appropriate images
00359             if( LoadTextMercPopupImages( ubBackgroundIndex, ubBorderIndex ) == FALSE )
00360             {
00361                   MemFree( pPopUpTextBox );
00362                   return( -1 );
00363             }
00364 
00365       }
00366       else
00367       {
00368             // has been created already, 
00369             // Check if these images are different
00370 
00371             // grab box
00372             pPopUpTextBox = GetPopUpBoxIndex( iBoxId );
00373 
00374             // box has valid id and no instance?..error
00375             Assert( pPopUpTextBox );
00376             
00377                   // copy over ptr
00378             gPopUpTextBox = pPopUpTextBox;
00379 
00380             if ( ubBackgroundIndex != pPopUpTextBox->ubBackgroundIndex || ubBorderIndex != pPopUpTextBox->ubBorderIndex || !pPopUpTextBox->fMercTextPopupInitialized)
00381             {
00382                   //Remove old, set new
00383                   RemoveTextMercPopupImages( );
00384                   if( LoadTextMercPopupImages( ubBackgroundIndex, ubBorderIndex ) == FALSE )
00385                   {
00386                         return( -1 );
00387                   }
00388             }
00389       }
00390 
00391       gPopUpTextBox->uiFlags = guiFlags;
00392       // reset flags
00393       guiFlags = 0;
00394 
00395       usStringPixLength = WFStringPixLength( (UINT16 *) pString, TEXT_POPUP_FONT);
00396 
00397       if( usStringPixLength < ( usWidth - ( MERC_TEXT_POPUP_WINDOW_TEXT_OFFSET_X ) * 2 ) )
00398       {
00399             usWidth = usStringPixLength + MERC_TEXT_POPUP_WINDOW_TEXT_OFFSET_X * 2;
00400             usTextWidth = usWidth - ( MERC_TEXT_POPUP_WINDOW_TEXT_OFFSET_X  ) * 2 + 1;
00401       }
00402       else
00403       {
00404             usTextWidth = usWidth - ( MERC_TEXT_POPUP_WINDOW_TEXT_OFFSET_X  ) * 2 + 1 - usMarginX;
00405       }
00406 
00407       usNumberVerticalPixels = IanWrappedStringHeight(0,0, usTextWidth, 2, TEXT_POPUP_FONT, MERC_TEXT_COLOR, (STR16) pString, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00408 
00409       usNumberOfLines = usNumberVerticalPixels / TEXT_POPUP_GAP_BN_LINES;
00410 
00411       usHeight = usNumberVerticalPixels + MERC_TEXT_POPUP_WINDOW_TEXT_OFFSET_X * 2;
00412 
00413       // Add height for margins
00414       usHeight += usMarginTopY + usMarginBottomY;
00415 
00416       // Add width for margins
00417       usWidth += (usMarginX*2);
00418 
00419       // Add width for iconic...
00420       if ( ( pPopUpTextBox->uiFlags & ( MERC_POPUP_PREPARE_FLAGS_STOPICON | MERC_POPUP_PREPARE_FLAGS_SKULLICON ) ) )
00421       {
00422             // Make minimun height for box...
00423             if ( usHeight < 45 )
00424             {
00425                   usHeight = 45;
00426             }
00427             usWidth += 35;
00428       }
00429 
00430       if( usWidth >= MERC_BACKGROUND_WIDTH )
00431             usWidth = MERC_BACKGROUND_WIDTH-1;
00432       //make sure the area isnt bigger then the background texture
00433       if( ( usWidth >= MERC_BACKGROUND_WIDTH ) || usHeight >= MERC_BACKGROUND_HEIGHT)
00434       {
00435             if( iBoxId == -1 )
00436             {
00437                   MemFree( pPopUpTextBox );
00438             }
00439 
00440             return( -1 );
00441       }
00442       // Create a background video surface to blt the face onto
00443       memset( &vs_desc, 0, sizeof( VSURFACE_DESC ) );
00444       vs_desc.fCreateFlags = VSURFACE_CREATE_DEFAULT | VSURFACE_SYSTEM_MEM_USAGE;
00445       vs_desc.usWidth = usWidth;
00446       vs_desc.usHeight = usHeight;
00447       vs_desc.ubBitDepth = 16;
00448       CHECKF( AddVideoSurface( &vs_desc, &pPopUpTextBox->uiSourceBufferIndex) );
00449       pPopUpTextBox->fMercTextPopupSurfaceInitialized = TRUE;
00450 
00451       pPopUpTextBox->sWidth = usWidth;
00452       pPopUpTextBox->sHeight = usHeight;
00453 
00454       *pActualWidth = usWidth;
00455       *pActualHeight = usHeight;
00456 
00457 
00458       DestRect.iLeft = 0;
00459       DestRect.iTop = 0;
00460       DestRect.iRight = DestRect.iLeft + usWidth;
00461       DestRect.iBottom = DestRect.iTop + usHeight;
00462 
00463       if ( pPopUpTextBox->uiFlags & MERC_POPUP_PREPARE_FLAGS_TRANS_BACK )
00464       {
00465             // Zero with yellow,
00466             // Set source transparcenty
00467             SetVideoSurfaceTransparency( pPopUpTextBox->uiSourceBufferIndex, FROMRGB(  255, 255, 0 ) );
00468 
00469         pDestBuf = (UINT16*)LockVideoSurface( pPopUpTextBox->uiSourceBufferIndex, &uiDestPitchBYTES);
00470 
00471             usColorVal = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 255, 255, 0 ) );
00472             usLoopEnd  = ( usWidth * usHeight );
00473 
00474             for ( i = 0; i <usLoopEnd; i++ )
00475             {
00476                   pDestBuf[ i ] = usColorVal;
00477             }
00478 
00479             UnLockVideoSurface(pPopUpTextBox->uiSourceBufferIndex);
00480 
00481       }
00482       else
00483       {
00484             if( !GetVideoSurface( &hSrcVSurface, pPopUpTextBox->uiMercTextPopUpBackground) )
00485             {
00486                   AssertMsg( 0, String( "Failed to GetVideoSurface for PrepareMercPopupBox.  VSurfaceID:  %d", 
00487                         pPopUpTextBox->uiMercTextPopUpBackground ) );
00488             }
00489 
00490             pDestBuf = (UINT16*)LockVideoSurface( pPopUpTextBox->uiSourceBufferIndex, &uiDestPitchBYTES);
00491             pSrcBuf = LockVideoSurface( pPopUpTextBox->uiMercTextPopUpBackground, &uiSrcPitchBYTES);
00492 
00493             Blt8BPPDataSubTo16BPPBuffer( pDestBuf,  uiDestPitchBYTES, hSrcVSurface, pSrcBuf,uiSrcPitchBYTES,0,0, &DestRect);
00494 
00495             UnLockVideoSurface( pPopUpTextBox->uiMercTextPopUpBackground);
00496             UnLockVideoSurface(pPopUpTextBox->uiSourceBufferIndex);
00497       }
00498 
00499       GetVideoObject(&hImageHandle, pPopUpTextBox->uiMercTextPopUpBorder );
00500 
00501       usPosX = usPosY = 0;
00502       //blit top row of images
00503       for(i=TEXT_POPUP_GAP_BN_LINES; i< usWidth-TEXT_POPUP_GAP_BN_LINES; i+=TEXT_POPUP_GAP_BN_LINES)
00504       {
00505             //TOP ROW
00506         BltVideoObject(pPopUpTextBox->uiSourceBufferIndex, hImageHandle, 1,i, usPosY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00507             //BOTTOM ROW
00508         BltVideoObject(pPopUpTextBox->uiSourceBufferIndex, hImageHandle, 6,i, usHeight - TEXT_POPUP_GAP_BN_LINES+6, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00509       }
00510 
00511       //blit the left and right row of images
00512       usPosX = 0;
00513       for(i=TEXT_POPUP_GAP_BN_LINES; i< usHeight-TEXT_POPUP_GAP_BN_LINES; i+=TEXT_POPUP_GAP_BN_LINES)
00514       {
00515         BltVideoObject(pPopUpTextBox->uiSourceBufferIndex, hImageHandle, 3,usPosX, i, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00516         BltVideoObject(pPopUpTextBox->uiSourceBufferIndex, hImageHandle, 4,usPosX+usWidth-4, i, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00517       }
00518 
00519       //blt the corner images for the row
00520       //top left
00521       BltVideoObject(pPopUpTextBox->uiSourceBufferIndex, hImageHandle, 0, 0, usPosY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00522       //top right
00523       BltVideoObject(pPopUpTextBox->uiSourceBufferIndex, hImageHandle, 2, usWidth-TEXT_POPUP_GAP_BN_LINES, usPosY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00524       //bottom left
00525       BltVideoObject(pPopUpTextBox->uiSourceBufferIndex, hImageHandle, 5, 0, usHeight-TEXT_POPUP_GAP_BN_LINES, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00526       //bottom right
00527       BltVideoObject(pPopUpTextBox->uiSourceBufferIndex, hImageHandle, 7, usWidth-TEXT_POPUP_GAP_BN_LINES, usHeight-TEXT_POPUP_GAP_BN_LINES, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00528 
00529       // Icon if ness....
00530       if ( pPopUpTextBox->uiFlags & MERC_POPUP_PREPARE_FLAGS_STOPICON )
00531       {
00532             BltVideoObjectFromIndex( pPopUpTextBox->uiSourceBufferIndex, guiBoxIcons, 0, 5, 4, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00533       }
00534       if ( pPopUpTextBox->uiFlags & MERC_POPUP_PREPARE_FLAGS_SKULLICON )
00535       {
00536             BltVideoObjectFromIndex( pPopUpTextBox->uiSourceBufferIndex, guiSkullIcons, 0, 9, 4, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00537       }
00538 
00539       //Get the font and shadow colors
00540       GetMercPopupBoxFontColor( ubBackgroundIndex, &ubFontColor, &ubFontShadowColor );
00541 
00542       SetFontShadow( ubFontShadowColor );
00543       SetFontDestBuffer( pPopUpTextBox->uiSourceBufferIndex, 0, 0, usWidth, usHeight, FALSE );
00544 
00545       //Display the text
00546       sDispTextXPos = (INT16)(( MERC_TEXT_POPUP_WINDOW_TEXT_OFFSET_X + usMarginX ));
00547 
00548       if ( pPopUpTextBox->uiFlags & ( MERC_POPUP_PREPARE_FLAGS_STOPICON | MERC_POPUP_PREPARE_FLAGS_SKULLICON ) )
00549       {
00550             sDispTextXPos += 30;    
00551       }
00552 
00553 
00554 //if language represents words with a single char
00555 #ifdef SINGLE_CHAR_WORDS
00556       {
00557             //Enable the use of single word wordwrap
00558             if( gfUseWinFonts )
00559             {
00560                   UseSingleCharWordsForWordWrap( TRUE );
00561             }
00562 
00563             //Display the text
00564             DisplayWrappedString( sDispTextXPos, (INT16)(( MERC_TEXT_POPUP_WINDOW_TEXT_OFFSET_Y + usMarginTopY ) ), usTextWidth, 2, MERC_TEXT_FONT, ubFontColor,  pString, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00565 
00566             //Disable the use of single word wordwrap
00567             UseSingleCharWordsForWordWrap( FALSE );
00568       }
00569 #else
00570       {
00571             //Display the text
00572             DisplayWrappedString( sDispTextXPos, (INT16)(( MERC_TEXT_POPUP_WINDOW_TEXT_OFFSET_Y + usMarginTopY ) ), usTextWidth, 2, MERC_TEXT_FONT, ubFontColor,  pString, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00573       }
00574 #endif
00575 
00576 
00577       SetFontDestBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
00578       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
00579 
00580       if( iBoxId == -1 )
00581       {
00582             // now return attemp to add to pop up box list, if successful will return index
00583             return( AddPopUpBoxToList( pPopUpTextBox ) );
00584       }
00585       else
00586       {
00587             // set as current box
00588             SetCurrentPopUpBox( iBoxId );
00589 
00590             return( iBoxId );
00591       }
00592 }
00593 
00594 //Deletes the surface thats contains the border, background and the text.
00595 BOOLEAN RemoveMercPopupBox()
00596 {
00597 
00598       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00599 
00600       // make sure the current box does in fact exist
00601       if( gPopUpTextBox == NULL )
00602       {
00603             // failed..
00604             return( FALSE );
00605       }
00606 
00607       // now check to see if inited...
00608       if( gPopUpTextBox->fMercTextPopupSurfaceInitialized )
00609       {
00610 
00611             // now find this box in the list
00612             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAX_NUMBER_OF_POPUP_BOXES; iCounter++ )
00613             {
00614                   if( gpPopUpBoxList[ iCounter ] == gPopUpTextBox )
00615                   {
00616                          gpPopUpBoxList[ iCounter ] = NULL;
00617                          iCounter = MAX_NUMBER_OF_POPUP_BOXES;
00618                   }
00619             }
00620             // yep, get rid of the bloody...
00621             DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex(gPopUpTextBox->uiSourceBufferIndex);
00622 
00623             //DEF Added 5/26
00624             //Delete the background and the border
00625             RemoveTextMercPopupImages( );
00626 
00627             MemFree( gPopUpTextBox );
00628 
00629             // reset current ptr
00630             gPopUpTextBox = NULL;
00631 
00632       }
00633 
00634 
00635 
00636       return(TRUE);
00637 }
00638 
00639 
00640 BOOLEAN RemoveMercPopupBoxFromIndex( UINT32 uiId )
00641 {
00642       // find this box, set it to current, and delete it
00643       if( SetCurrentPopUpBox( uiId ) == FALSE )
00644       {
00645             // failed
00646             return( FALSE );
00647       }
00648 
00649       // now try to remove it
00650       return( RemoveMercPopupBox( ) );
00651 }
00652 
00653 
00654 //Pass in the background index, and pointers to the font and shadow color
00655 void  GetMercPopupBoxFontColor( UINT8 ubBackgroundIndex, UINT8 *pubFontColor, UINT8 *pubFontShadowColor)
00656 {
00657       switch( ubBackgroundIndex )
00658       {
00659             case BASIC_MERC_POPUP_BACKGROUND:
00660                   *pubFontColor = TEXT_POPUP_COLOR;
00661                   *pubFontShadowColor = DEFAULT_SHADOW;
00662                   break;
00663 
00664             case WHITE_MERC_POPUP_BACKGROUND:
00665                   *pubFontColor = 2;
00666                   *pubFontShadowColor = FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE;
00667                   break;
00668 
00669             case GREY_MERC_POPUP_BACKGROUND:
00670                   *pubFontColor = 2;
00671                   *pubFontShadowColor = NO_SHADOW;
00672                   break;
00673 
00674             case LAPTOP_POPUP_BACKGROUND:
00675                   *pubFontColor = TEXT_POPUP_COLOR;
00676                   *pubFontShadowColor = DEFAULT_SHADOW;
00677                   break;
00678 
00679             default:
00680                   *pubFontColor = TEXT_POPUP_COLOR;
00681                   *pubFontShadowColor = DEFAULT_SHADOW;
00682                   break;
00683       }
00684 }

00687 {
00688       guiFlags |= uiFlags;
00689       return( TRUE );
00690 }

00694 BOOLEAN SetPrepareMercPopUpFlagsFromIndex( UINT32 uiFlags, UINT32 uiId )
00695 {
00696       // find this box, set it to current, and delete it
00697       if( SetCurrentPopUpBox( uiId ) == FALSE )
00698       {
00699             // failed
00700             return( FALSE );
00701       }
00702 
00703       // now try to remove it
00704       return( SetPrepareMercPopupFlags( uiFlags ) );
00705 }
